author: Simon Difford
description: Very refreshing and light. Perfect for a summer's afternoon. Our own favourite of the three initial Ketel One botanical serves.Also, consider serving as a Spritz: Pour 90ml/3oz Prosecco, 45ml/1.5oz Botanical Grapefruit & Rose and 60ml/2oz soda water into an ice-filled glass and briefly stir.
name: Grapefruit & Rose Seltz

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir
